channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: The Journey Ahead
channel.desc: Embark on an epic road trip as two strangers - a famous actress and a young wilderness expert - drive from LA to New York together, learning life-changing lessons along the way.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: The Magic of Lemon Drops
channel.desc: When Lolly's Aunt Gert gives her three magical lemon drops, she gets to experience what her life would have been like if she had lived her unfulfilled dreams.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: A Royal Makeover
channel.desc: When Ramone discovers he is the heir to San Pablo, royal expert Angelica is hired to turn him into a suitable king. Has he finally found his queen.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Making Waves
channel.desc: When a music label executive goes to a festival on the Outer Banks to check out an elusive new band, she discovers that the group is fronted by her childhood sweetheart.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Heart Of The Manor
channel.desc: On the eve of her sister's wedding, real estate agent Lisa must decide if developer Matthew Wallace holds the key to her heart.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Game, Set, Love
channel.desc: Former tennis pro Taylor reluctantly agrees to coach her friend Will for a mixed doubles tournament, only to find there is a lot more to him than she thought.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: An Unexpected Valentine
channel.desc: A chance encounter on Valentine's Day brings Hannah and Finn together as they race through New York City to return a lost engagement ring and save one couple's special day.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Junebug
channel.desc: 40-year-old book editor Juniper is magically reconnected with an eight-year-old version of herself who questions her life choices, including the dream of writing her own stories.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: A Bridesmaid In Love
channel.desc: When the older brother of the bride catches perpetual bridesmaid Cate's eye, she must choose between fanning old flames and lighting new ones.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Hats Off To Love
channel.desc: Stella designs hats and fascinators for socialite Rosalind and meets her son Christian who's training a horse to compete in the Louisville Derby.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Sense And Sensibility
channel.desc: In this period adaptation of the Jane Austen classic, Marianne is torn between two potential suitors, while Elinor pines for a man beyond reach. Romantic drama.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Sweet As Pie
channel.desc: When Tamara visits her family's apple orchard, she reconnects with her childhood best friend and together they fight - armed with pastry and passion - to keep the orchard alive.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: A Match In Manhattan
channel.desc: When Celeste loses her teaching job, her boss puts her forward for an au-pair job with infamous New York property tycoon Richard Trapp.
